Topic.Title: Dell's Customer Service is destroying the profitability of this company

Message.Msg: Some years back Dell had the best customer service in the industry. They were the gold standard for cs, and then they were raided by HP and Apple, among others. Ever wonder how Apple's cs went from abysmal to #1 so quickly? They stole the Dell customer service folks! True story. 

Message.Msg: Dell has been dropping every day since earnings. "Dell" sounds identical to "Drop" in Chinese. Time to get rid of Michael Dell.
